snippet: The decree enabling the president to deport non-Egyptians convicted of crimes could aid an imprisoned journalist, Peter Greste.
abstract: Egyptian Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi issues law that allows him to deport non-Egyptians convicted of crimes to their home countries; move could lead to release of Peter Greste, one of three journalists from Al Jazeera English news channel who have been imprisoned for almost a year.
lead_paragraph: The decree enabling the president to deport non-Egyptians convicted of crimes could aid an imprisoned journalist, Peter Greste.

headline.main: Decree by Sisi Could Lead Egypt to Free Journalist
